channel.title: EXCEPTION ERROR! Please read
channel.description:
Ok, I use RicScape V4's source. I added in a dark bow minigame, now I get this error when I run the server:
Starting RicScape v4 Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "4 13 3346 9626 0 3347 9627 3345 9625 1 Slayer Golem" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1377) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:27)
I've tried EVERYTHING! I don't know what it is, someone help me out here?

item.title: EXCEPTION ERROR! Please read
item.dc:creator: @Deadmeat Deadmeat
item.description:
@Deadmeat wrote:

Ohhh I see what you mean…

I’ll get on that and tell you the results.

WOOHOO!!! FIXED!!

Read full topic

item.description:
@Pk_strenght_LTD wrote:

press tab and write new id, press tab again and do that
TABS are always after id in here
Also are in shops.cfg

haxe you could come to my topic, need help

item.title: EXCEPTION ERROR! Please read
item.dc:creator: @Deadmeat Deadmeat
item.description:
@Deadmeat wrote:

Ok, I use RicScape V4’s source. I added in a dark bow minigame, now I get this error when I run the server:

Starting RicScape v4 Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “4
13 3346 9626 0 3347 9627 3345 9625 1 Slayer Golem”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1377)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:23)
at server.main(server.java:27)

I’ve tried EVERYTHING! I don’t know what it is, someone help me out here?
